LanguageData.PS_Recipes_Surgery_Laryngoplasty.label: Laryngoplasty
LanguageData.PS_Recipes_Surgery_Laryngoplasty.descrip: A laryngeal reconstruction surgery that is able to alter or restore a persons voice. Very useful for people who suffer from annoying voices, creepy breathing, or botched laryngoplasties.
LanguageData.PS_Recipes_Surgery_ImmunityBoost.label: boost immunity
LanguageData.PS_Recipes_Surgery_ImmunityBoost.descrip: Involves the injection of plasteel shavings directly into the bloodstream. If performed correctly the self sterilizing nature of plasteel can improve a patient's immune system. If performed incorrectly it could have the opposite effect.
LanguageData.PS_MakeThin.label: Body Mod: Reduce Fat
LanguageData.PS_MakeThin.description: Uses liposuction in conjecture with stomach stapling to take pounds off and keep them off.
LanguageData.PS_MakeStandard.label: Body Mod: Standardize
LanguageData.PS_MakeStandard.description: Removes or replaces lose muscle and fat to leave the patient with a standard not special physique.
LanguageData.PS_MakeLookFemale.label: Body Mod: Feminize
LanguageData.PS_MakeLookFemale.description: Gives the patient the appearance of a standard female body without changing actual biological sex.
LanguageData.PS_MakeHulk.label: Body Mod: Stimulate Muscle Growth
LanguageData.PS_MakeHulk.description: Uses electrodes along with steroid injections to rapidly develope muscle. Warning: Leg day not included!
LanguageData.PS_MakeFat.label: Body Mod: Add Fat
LanguageData.PS_MakeFat.description: Injects donor fat and slows the patients metabolism causing them to gain weight shockingly quickly.
LanguageData.PS_MakeLookMale.label: Body Mod: Masculinize
LanguageData.PS_MakeLookMale.description: Gives the patient the appearance of a standard male body without changing actual biological sex.
LanguageData.PS_ChangeSex.label: Body Mod: Sex Change
LanguageData.PS_ChangeSex.description: Alters the patient's bological sex to be the opposite of what it currently is. This surgery is purely internal and does not effect appearances.
